dcterms:creator: K. Rakelly
A. Zhou
D. Quillen
C. Finn
S. Levine
dcterms:description: A 2D navigation environment where the agent must navigate to a goal location. Tasks differ in reward functions that describe the goal position, which is uniformly distributed in a square.
dcterms:title: Point-Robot

dcterms:creator: K. Rakelly
A. Zhou
D. Quillen
C. Finn
S. Levine
dcterms:description: A multi-task MuJoCo benchmark where tasks differ in reward functions specified by the target velocity of the agent, which is uniformly distributed.
dcterms:title: Half-Cheetah-Vel

dcterms:creator: K. Rakelly
A. Zhou
D. Quillen
C. Finn
S. Levine
dcterms:description: A multi-task MuJoCo benchmark where tasks differ in reward functions specified by the goal direction of the agent's motion, which is uniformly distributed.
dcterms:title: Ant-Dir

dcterms:creator: K. Rakelly
A. Zhou
D. Quillen
C. Finn
S. Levine
dcterms:description: A multi-task MuJoCo benchmark where tasks differ in transition dynamics, with physical parameters such as body mass and friction being randomized.
dcterms:title: Walker-Param

dcterms:creator: K. Rakelly
A. Zhou
D. Quillen
C. Finn
S. Levine
dcterms:description: A multi-task MuJoCo benchmark where tasks differ in transition dynamics, with physical parameters such as body mass, inertia, damping, and friction being randomized.
dcterms:title: Hopper-Param
